lines.text: One thing about this, the longer you last the less you care.
This country is crawling with Indians, and you're going fishing.
There are lots of ways to die. Starving to death isn't my favorite.
He can run but he can't hide.

[Harry pulls out a pistol]
What's that for?
In case he's hard of hearing.
It depends on whose ox gets gored.
Next time you try anything like that, I'll forget you're a woman.
I supposed you never made a mistake.
